FILE: cm160385v11.0.txt
DYAD: ARGENTINA - NORWAY
RIVALRY: RIV381
DISPUTE(S): MID2840 


PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170728
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2840 

TERRMID: MID2840 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2840 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2840 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2840 3 -- not islands
ISLMID-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: from NYT 3/5/1948, a Norwegian fishing vessel was warned by an Argentine naval vessel that she must have Argentine permission to anchor at a British-claimed island, Deception Island. Coded not islands because the islands involved in this MID are disputed by Argentina and UK, but they are not disputed between Argentina and Norway. Dispute is outside of this dyad, but connected to the Argentina-UK islands dispute. 

CIVWARMID: MID2840 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2840 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2840 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2840 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2840 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES:
